snippet: After a scandal that cost Tim Pernetti and Mike Rice their jobs, Julie Hermann was named Rutgers’ athletic director, making her one of the few women leading a major sports program.
abstract: Rutgers names Julie Hermann its new athletic director, making her one of the few women leading a major sports program.
lead_paragraph: After a scandal that cost Tim Pernetti and Mike Rice their jobs, Julie Hermann was named Rutgers’ athletic director, making her one of the few women leading a major sports program.

headline.seo: Rutgers Chooses a Woman to Lead Athletic Department
headline.main: Tired of Bad News, Rutgers Makes News With Its New Athletic Director
headline.print_headline: Tired of All the Bad News, Rutgers Makes News With Its New Athletic Director

keywords.value: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
keywords.name: organizations
